answers.answer: Are you testing your blood sugars regularly? Are you counting carbs correctly and dosing accordingly? If your sugar is high, do you do a correction dose? LOTS to keep in mind while trying to keep sugar #'s in the safe range......Good luck - keep at it - it will keep you as healthy as possible long-term!

question: I have had diabetes for a year and a half and i am haveing trouble with my sugar levels. When i whatch what i eat and eat my blood levles are high when i din't they can be low any help?
title: Can any one help me?
